price: C’est Lui qui fait descendre sur Son serviteur des versets claires, afin qu’il vous fasse sortir des ténèbres à la lumière; et assurément Allah est Compatissant envers vous, et Très Miséricordieux.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ لِّيُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yunazzilu ʿalā ʿabdihi āyātin bayyinātin liyukh'rijakum mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri wa-inna al-laha bikum laraūfun raḥīmun
translations: that He may bring you out
